segments.text: I'm back . My bid on the Buddha is still the highest !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't you want to hear more about my statue ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't get ahead of yourself . Fat boy isn't yours yet .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: His name is not fat boy ! You can be so rude sometimes .
segments.speaker: S2
